headline: Going Rogue: Prince Harry and Meghan Surprised the Palace
abstract: The queen had yet to give her approval to their idea of becoming part-time royals, but word of the plan was about to leak.
lead_paragraph: LONDON â€” Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, failed to get clearance from Queen Elizabeth II before announcing their unorthodox plan to become part-time, financially independent royals and divide their time between Britain and North America.
keywords: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
